title: Senior Automation Engineer
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you. 
Overview:
Our Compliance Line of Business (LoB) is seeking a Senior Automation Engineer, This role is responsible for quality assurance of one or more Software as a Service (SaaS) products that enable the world’s largest financial institutions to be compliant with global regulations for Trade, Communications, Suitability, and Conduct surveillance. We apply cutting-edge technology to detect and prevent market abuse and financial crime.
Description:
We are looking for an experienced tester for our team in Israel. The Senior Automation Engineer will work with colleagues in Israel and the SURVEIL-X R&D team in India, to rapidly deliver high-quality, innovative SaaS solutions to market.
Main Responsibilities and Deliverables:             
Lead and oversee quality assurance, ensuring a proper balance of functional testing and automation
Be part of a cross-functional Scrum team that develops and supports the product; you will be working hand in hand with the other R&D functions
Build and execute test suites for distributed product deployment
Installation and staging of product deployments in a variety of configurations to testing environments
Build automation test suits for regression and new features
Testing UI components, Web Services, checking data in databases, automating deployment and data generation
Open bugs detailing relevant information in a repeatable way
Reproduce issues, and verify defect resolutions
Be involved in new features development, provide inputs to POs and Developers on the correct behavior of the system
Install and Configure testing systems with the latest deliveries for testing.
Interact closely with Build Engineers on the evolution of Continuous Integration and Deployment
Adhere to agile development principles while following and improving all aspects of the scrum process
Education:         
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field or equivalent work experience
Level Distinctions:
7+ years of experience in testing distributed systems with web-based front-end and backend web services as a Senior Automation Engineer with very good test automation skills
Experience in coding the Automation Framework (TestNG, Selenium, or any other UI/Backend Framework)
Hands-on experience in the programming language in Java
Hands-on experience in API testing
Experience in using code versioning tools like - Git/Bitbucket/SVN
Experience in preparing Test Plans/Test Strategies/Reports
Hands on Test Management tools like TestLink, X-Ray
Expertise in Impact Assessment, Test management, and coordination with a focus on Quality Delivery
Experience working with Databases, and writing SQL queries for data validation.
Product company experience, performing testing for distributed enterprise product
Experienced with installing software builds
Experienced working on Linux and/or Unix
Have excellent communication skills
Be a self-motivated, rapid learner with an active interest in the latest tools, technologies and processes
Drive to deliver high-quality solutions
Customer-focused attitude and approach
Experience working in Agile
A team player
Desirable Qualifications:
Experience working on DevOps tools, Jenkins, ansible code, etc.
Experience working with Security tools BlackDuck, Veracode
Experience working with Test Coverage tool, SonarQube
ISTQB/ISEB qualifications
Knowledge of AWS Services
Knowledge of NICE Actimize Frameworks like AIS, RCM and AAF
Hands-on coding experience in any software development or scripting language
#LI-HybridAbout NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
